sentences.sContent: There are 24 books in the Hebrew Bible, or Tanakh—and depending upon the denomination, between 66 and 84 more books in Christian Bibles, divided between the Old and New Testaments.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are 24 books in the Hebrew Bible, or Tanakh—and depending upon the denomination, between 66 and 84 more books in Christian Bibles, divided between the Old and New Testaments.
sentences.sCn: 希伯来《圣经》共有24卷，又名塔纳赫（即《旧约》的源头——译者注）——而且，基督教圣经由于教派的不同，要多出66至84卷，分为《旧约》和《新约》。
